title: Riot i need Help AND support
body:
Can you please CLARIFY just once and for all what someone has to do in order to get banned or to get his account suspended and for how much time for each Penalty and also what someone has to do in order to get perma-banned ???

Because i see a lot of Youtube videos of people getting banned left right and center and i DON'T know the REASON of which Riot operates on this space 

Sooo

PLEASE RIOT CLARIFY THIS ONCE AND FOR ALL SO IT WONT BE ANY CONFUSION ANYMORE AND ALSO I WILL KNOW WHAT** NOT** TO DO SO MY ACCOUNT WILL BE PROTECTED AND NEVER BANNED :)

Just outline all the reasons please :)

replies.body:
It's hard to cover all this information in a single post, but some great places to start are listed below:

**1.** First, you should always strive to abide by [*The Summoner's Code*](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/). I feel this, in particular, is crucial to having a good time in League and to be on the right path of an honorary ally *and* opponent.

**2.** The [Instant Feedback System FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-) covers most of the reasons why players are either suspended or penalized for certain actions or behavior in-game.

**3.** Finally, the [*'Reporting a Player' Guide*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player) goes over examples of both *Reportable* and *Acceptable* behavior in-game. It's a great supplement to the FAQ above.

I hope this helped. While I can't list every single possible scenario of what will and will not get you banned, I feel these guides will point you in the right direction. You can always post a discussion to the [**Player Behavior & Moderation Boards**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) if you ever want to have a conversation regarding the specifics of these systems.
